metadata.title: Power BI Data Analyst Associate
metadata.subtitle: Master data analysis with Power BI
metadata.description: Learn to connect, transform, and visualize data using Power BI. Prepare for the PL-300 certification exam.

overview.summary: Power BI Data Analyst Associate training teaches you to implement and maintain the data models and reports that organizational users will use in their decision-making processes. Learn to connect to data sources, transform data, and create compelling visualizations.
overview.targetAudience: Data analysts who want to learn how to use Power BI to perform data analysis and create compelling visualizations and prepare for the PL-300 certification exam.

modules.title: Data Preparation with Power Query
modules.description: Connect to and transform data sources

sections.content:
Data Acquisition and Transformation

Power BI can connect to hundreds of data sources. Learn to efficiently extract, transform, and load data for analysis.

sections.title: Data Sources
items: SQL Server and Azure SQL Database

labs.title: Data Connection Lab
labs.description: Connect to multiple data sources and perform transformations

sections.content: Data modeling is the foundation of effective Power BI solutions. Learn to create efficient data models that support complex analysis and reporting.

sections.caption: Relationships, DAX formulas, and model optimization

labs.title: Data Modeling Lab
labs.description: Create complex data models with relationships and DAX

modules.title: Data Visualization and Analysis
modules.description: Create compelling visualizations and perform analysis

sections.content:
Advanced Visualization Techniques

Learn to create visually appealing and interactive reports that effectively communicate insights to stakeholders.

modules.title: Power BI Deployment and Administration
modules.description: Deploy and manage Power BI assets
objectives: Publish reports to Power BI Service

sections.content: Learn to deploy Power BI solutions to production and manage them effectively in enterprise environments.

labs.title: Deployment Lab
labs.description: Publish and manage Power BI reports in the service

includes: Power BI Data Analyst Associate badge

instructor.name: David Kim
instructor.title: Business Intelligence Solutions Architect
instructor.bio: David is a Business Intelligence Solutions Architect with extensive experience in data analytics and visualization. He has helped organizations transform their data into actionable insights using Power BI and other BI tools.
certifications: Microsoft Certified: Power BI Data Analyst Associate
Microsoft Certified: Azure Data Engineer Associate

resources.title: Power BI Data Analyst Associate Learning Path
resources.description: Official Microsoft learning path for Power BI Data Analysts

resources.title: Power BI Tutorials and Best Practices
resources.description: Power BI tutorials and advanced techniques

resources.title: PL-300 Practice Tests
resources.description: Official practice tests for PL-300 certification

resources.title: Power BI Desktop
resources.description: Download Power BI Desktop for report development

certification.name: Microsoft Certified: Power BI Data Analyst Associate
certification.description: Demonstrate skills in preparing data, modeling data, visualizing and analyzing data, and deploying and maintaining assets

faq.question: Do I need programming experience?
faq.answer: No, this course focuses on Power BI's visual interface. However, you'll learn DAX formulas and Power Query M language.

faq.question: What data sources can Power BI connect to?
faq.answer: Power BI can connect to hundreds of data sources including Excel, SQL databases, Azure services, web APIs, and more.

faq.question: Is this course hands-on?
faq.answer: Yes, extensive hands-on labs where you'll build real Power BI reports and dashboards from start to finish.

faq.question: Do I need a Power BI license?
faq.answer: For the labs, you'll use a free Power BI Desktop license. Some advanced features may require Power BI Pro.
